page.title: List of Major League Baseball stadiums

revisions.rev:
The following is a '''list of current and former [[Major League Baseball]] [[baseball park|stadiums]]'''. ==Current stadiums== Stadiums are listed by their [[seating capacity]] for MLB games. United]] (1996âpresent) | |} ==Notes== * {{note label|a|a}}'''Boldface''' indicates World Series won in inaugural year * {{note label|b|b}}[[Braves Field]] has never been closed; the majority of stands were demolished in 1955, with the remainder reconfigured into present-day [[Nickerson Field]]. * {{note label|c|c}}[[Jarry Park Stadium]] has never been closed or demolished, but rather reconfigured into present-day [[Uniprix Stadium|Stade Uniprix]], a tennis venue. ==See also== * [[List of Major League Baseball spring training stadiums|List of MLB spring-training stadiums]] * [[List of U.S. baseball stadiums by capacity]] * [[List of U.S. stadiums by capacity]] * [[List of baseball parks by capacity]] * [[List of AstroTurf installations in the USA]] * [[List of current National Football League stadiums]] * [[List of National Hockey League arenas]] * [[List of Major League Soccer stadiums]] * [[List of Major League Lacrosse stadiums]] * [[List of National Basketball Association arenas]] ==References== {{Reflist}} ;Further reading {{Refbegin}} * {{Cite book|title=Green Cathedrals: The Ultimate Celebration of All Major League Ballparks|first=Phillip|last=Lowry|publisher=[[Walker & Company]]|date=October 31, 2006|isbn=0802715621}} * {{Cite book|title=Lost Ballparks: A Celebration of Baseball's Legendary Fields|first=Lawrence|last=Ritter|publisher=Studio|date=March 8, 1994|isbn=9780140234220}} {{Refend}} ==External links== * [http://www.ballparks.com/baseball/index.htm Ballparks].
